Friday.description: DAY 2: August 1st: NORTHEAST: variety of art and music

Saturday.description: DAY 3: August 2nd: NORTHWEST & MAIN EVENT: Alleycat bike race, day of music, art, dance and brunch at houses, with music, lectures and tabling at St Stevens, followed by main St Stevens band lineup at 5.  After party at the Pinch

Sunday.description: DAY 4: August 3rd: COOL-DOWN: Daytime shows & outdoor skate event including a ramen jump
